name: Project Staxolotl
description: This is a game created for the STL Arcade Jam, a 48 hour game jam hosted at the STL Science Center, where many of the games that were made were put into a Winnitron Arcade Machine  for an upcoming video game exhibit at the Science Center. The game had to playable using the arcade machines controls (which on the keyboard are mapped to arrow keys for the left joystick, WASD for the right joystick, and the symbols . / and `, as well as the number 1, for buttons), and it had to based on an exhibit in the Science center. The science center has a family of axolotls, so our game is about many axolotls (who all live on Pluto) attempting to change Pluto's orbit by stacking on top of each-other and blowing on Neptune, all in an epic attempt to make Pluto a planet again.
